reviews.review_msg: You can tell he enjoys teaching. Can be funny but mostly very dry. I hate how he runs the class like high-school. Takes attendance TWICE to make sure you stay the whole time and doesn't allow food. Unnecessary since you can pass just by taking notes from the book. Make sure you do the key terms from his handouts!! And you'll be just fine.
Hard to understand his accent. And so many readings every week. Wanna to skip his class every week.
